title: Garen Ulting Leblanc
body:
{{champion:86}} waits in the brush. {{champion:7}}  gets close. {{champion:86}} pops combo, then uses Demacian Justice, and right before the ultimate finishes casting, {{champion:7}} goes invisible due to passive. 
What happens next is a bug and needs to be fixed.  When {{champion:7}} loses her stealth, either Demacian Justice finishes casting (even though {{champion:86}}  does not try to recast it), Demacian Justice goes on cooldown but {{champion:7}}  takes no damage, or nothing happens. 

Solution: {{champion:7}} 's passive does not cancel {{champion:86}}'s ultimate because no one escapes Justice!

replies.body: This is all false. Garen would *never * be able to get in range of Leblanc to use his ult.
You must not have read "waits in the brush" in the first line.
A Garen in the brush can be TRAUMATIZING! O_O
Doubly so if your playing Nightmare bots and ghost garens pop out at you every 3 seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Antonok,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KKZZL70p,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T22:00:25.223+0000)
>
> Doubly so if your playing Nightmare bots and ghost garens pop out at you every 3 seconds.

I miss nightmare bots, was so much fun. They need to do a mode where we can be the super bots vs each other. You know the rioters all played with them in their offices.
A Garen in the bush is worth two with your team.
Silences
Not just a silence. A 1.5 seconda silence
I miss URF and literally permasilencing people with Garen. It would really confuse those cheap spam casters, like Sona, Hecarim, Eve or Vlad.

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel Soto,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KKZZL70p,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-03-18T11:45:24.482+0000)
>
> Not just a silence. A 1.5 seconda silence

its longer then that, way longer
There are alot more bugs with Garen's ult other then just this. I can't even list all of them...
All single target abilities have a chance to fail when lederp pops her images

garens ult seem to stop me from using zonyas
also remove lb passive
It is perfectly fine for Garen's ult to stop if someone uses zhonyas. But it shouldn't cancel if someone goes stealth, except for Shaco's ult, Elise's repel, etc.
i think we should just agree to disagree here
I think Garen's silence is what is stopping you from using zhonyas, not his ultimate. But Leblanc's passive fits her theme. I would just like to argue that Justice > Deception
Justice is blind.

So is love...
So if justice is blind as well, and Garen is justice (which he is), then that means Garen is love! Garen hurts. Especially his Ult. Therefore, love hurts. That stinks. Which means love stinks.

Inb4 Boy Band Garen.
{{champion:238}} : Balance is a lie.
Therefore It doesn't care Leblanc is invisible

> I think we should just agree I'm wrong but am too egotistical to consider changing my mind.

Fixed it for you.

Your a perfect example of a most lol players i read complains about
lol
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/Lh4mxjO08HA/hqdefault.jpg
Because Garen has to wait in the brush to get any kills. {{champion:86}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=mikemcparty,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KKZZL70p,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-18T17:48:07.536+0000)
>
> Because Garen has to wait in the brush to get any kills. {{champion:86}} {{item:3070}}

or you can click Q and run through the enemy team to kill their adc like a man
Same thing happens with malz ult. If it breaks 40% she actually cleanses it. =/

Would Leblanc also cleanse out of Nocturne's fear channel? 
When I play Wukong, and Nocturne uses Unspeakable Horror on him, and I happen to use Wukong's Decoy, the channel still continues on the real Wukong. It does not switch to his clone.

That is because Wukong becomes invisible and places a decoy. Shaco and LeBlanc actually disappear for a moment before coming back, in stealth for the latter. All tethers continue no matter what until their duration ends or the person vanishes from the field (dead bodies considered vanished).

So yes Nocturne's fear would break.

I feel like considering similar situations altough this is how it currently functions it shouldn't be. For example in Urf I used to play nocturne and against fizz his fear would still work even through fizz e. this happened a lot so im absolutely sure. Morgana's ultimate also will still stay tethered to and stun targets in zhonyas, fiddle w still remains tethered to vlad in his pool. The point is tethers still remain attatched and affect untargetable targets as long as you tether before they become untargetable, and leblarg vanishing and coming back shouldn't break something like noc fear and malz ult. especially malz ult.

Untargetability doesn't affect tethers which is why someone like Karma is best against Vlad and Fizz. 

But Leblanc's Passive and Shaco's Ults literally take them outside of the game, into a different dimension, before coming back. They are unique abilities that are intended to remove anything that is on them at the time they activate it.

Dimension Teleport > Untargetable
ON the other hand, does Lederp's passive break her own tether to other champs? Sounds like I found a soft counter to her stun/snare (Whichever it was, it's been a while).
Would have to test it. I'd guess it wouldnt because leblarg is the source of the tether and not the target, but it very well might. and its a snare, to answer your confusion

I play Malz quite a bit and that's never happened to me.

Whenever I've combo'd a LB and her passive triggers, I just keep blasting thin air until she dies
It's pretty funny
It is likely a bug I hope. She shouldn't have a built in qss into her kit. It's happened to me a few times. It's a really shitty feeling
I assume it's a bug, considering it's not amazingly consistent and nothing else aside from tethers are broken or cleansed

You need to pop Ignite and bait her passive; when it does pop, the real LB will still be on fire. Ult her then, and it's ggwp (assuming she doesn't have the chance to teleport to the opposite end of the screen first).

I've never encountered this sort of bug since I always use the above strategy. But your ult definitely shouldn't go off cooldown, that's 100% bug right there.

P.S. You only need to use the champion icons once, it makes your post twice as difficult to read due to the extra spacing.
It also happened with Malzahar's ult, if you've just used it on a 400 HP LB she would go in her passive and your supression gets canceled, ffs.

Riot said they fixed that thing where people who go invisible prior to casting Demacian Justice will still be hit by the Demacian Justice.
THEY LIED.
Oh, did you know that players who jump as you cast Demacian Justice will also take no damage? But your ult will be on cooldown, because your justice decided to take a sick day that moment you're about to smite someone. 
Thanks Riot.
You know, if you couldn't fix the dang reason as to why this happens, they could've at least given Garen's Ult a range increase.

{{champion:86}} You are lying!  I nevah hit chew!
*{{champion:7}} and {{champion:7}} scurry away*
{{champion:86}}  You're tearing me apaht Leblanc!

Definitely true. I have never been able to cast Demacian Justice on someone that was the size of Tristana if they were directly next to someone the size of Sion. You click on Tristana, and Sion ends up getting the ultimate.
and when you ult sion it deals no dmg
Wait? Did you agreed with yourself? Or forgot to relog?
Looks to me like the OP was trying to start a conversation with that Zilean fellow there
I was talking to the Zilean. But when I was playing Garen, I had to wait in a brush for Leblanc to facecheck.
Oh ok :)
Garen is just a cancerous champ stop playing him
